thread.title: Taylor Swift & Katy Perry Reunite In Fantastic 'Chained To The Style' Mashup (LISTEN)
thread.title_full: Taylor Swift & Katy Perry Reunite In Fantastic 'Chained To The Style' Mashup (LISTEN)

title: Taylor Swift & Katy Perry Reunite In Fantastic 'Chained To The Style' Mashup (LISTEN)
text:
Taylor Swift & Katy Perry Reunite In Fantastic 'Chained To The Style' Mashup (LISTEN) Just now share 
We may never see the day when Taylor Swift and Katy Perry make nice and collaborate on a song together, but the pop titans, or at least their hits, have come together in the form of a new mashup called "Chained To The Style." { "position1" : { "type" : "artist", "id" : 33221, "name" : "Taylor Swift" } } 
For the the minute-and-a-half mashup, which surfaced on Tuesday (February 14), listeners hear the vocals from Swift's severely underrated 1989 single, "Style," layered atop the instrumental of Perry's newest single, "Chained to the Rhythm." Not so coincidentally, both of cuts feature production from pop hitmaker Max Martin . Even if this reunion only lives on a 88-second fan-made mashup, we'll take it. 
Take a listen to "Chained To The Style" below! Katy Perry & Taylor Swift in "Chained To The Style" #mashup pic.twitter.com/s4jXjYkvUm
